synopsis.text: It is 1943 in Europe, and Nazi Germany has secretly begun executing a mysterious plan codenamed "Urda" aimed at changing the course of history. Two elite agents, Janet and Erna, are tasked with investigating and foiling this plot. In the course of their mission, they encounter Chris, a young girl claiming to be a time traveler from the future. Through Chris, Janet and Erna learn that the Nazis have come into possession of an advanced ship capable of voyaging through time. This ship and its technology in the wrong hands could enable the Nazis to reshape the past and future to their advantage. Now in a race against time, Janet and Erna must track down the ship, rescue Chris, and prevent the Nazis from fully unlocking the secrets of the vessel to realize their ambitions of world domination through the covert Urda initiative.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
